llm_text:
Why:
- payment_format_ach (value=1) was the dominant driver, strongly increasing the model score (SHAP +2.776), i.e., the ACH payment format chiefly drove the flag.
- amount_received (17441.1) increased the score (SHAP +0.967), and amount_paid (17441.1) also increased it (SHAP +0.450), indicating the model responded to a relatively large transaction amount.
- to_bank (1467) contributed to an increased score (SHAP +0.510), meaning the receiving bank ID materially influenced the flag.
- hour (22) slightly decreased the score (SHAP −0.456), partially offsetting the increases above.

Conclusion:
The transaction was flagged principally because payment_format_ach plus sizable amounts (amount_received/amount_paid ≈ 17,441.1) and the receiving bank (to_bank=1467) raised the model score; the late hour (hour=22) modestly reduced it. If investigating, reviewers should prioritize verification of the ACH flow, the receiving bank (1467), and the reported amounts.
